Title: IronRuby
Description: IronRuby is a Open Source implementation of the Ruby programming language for .NET and Silverlight, heavily relying on Microsoft's Dynamic Language Runtime.
HomeWiki:
IronRuby is a Open Source implementation of the Ruby programming language for .NET and Silverlight, heavily relying on Microsoft's Dynamic Language Runtime.

The Coordinators of this project are responsible for managing contributions. The Coordinators are not granting, and will not grant, any IP rights to code or other material contributed to this project. The IP rights to each particular contribution are granted to you by the contributor under the Apache 2.0 license.
